text: The Orphans is the fifth studio album by Kristeen Young. Its tracks "Kill The Father" and "London Cry" were released as singles in the UK by Sanctuary/Attack. ==Track listing== #"Kill The Father" – 4:09 #"London Cry" – 4:36 #"Mixed Kids" – 4:03 #"(But It's All Just) Imagined" – 4:21 #"You Ruined Everything" – 3:48 #"Under a Landlocked Moon" – 3:43 #"9" – 3:49 #"Life's Not Short, It's Sooo Long" – 5:12 #"This Is The Dawn Of My D-Day" – 3:35 #"Dead Wrong" – 4:11 #"Before" – 7:17 ==Singles== * Kill The Father w/ Life's Not Short It's Sooo Long (Sanctuary/Attack Records 2006, UK) * London Cry w/ This Is The Dawn Of My D-Day (Sanctuary/Attack Records 2006, UK) == Musicians == *Kristeen Young: Vocals, keyboard *"Baby" Jeff White: Drums ==References== Category:Kristeen Young albums Category:2006 albums Category:Albums produced by Tony Visconti
title: The Orphans (album)
